components/themevale/sidebar/advertiseme:
Custom CMS Block

Custom CMS block displayed at the left sidebar on the Catalog Page. Put your own content here: text, html, images... whatever you like.

There are many similar sample content placeholders across the store. All editable from Theme Editor.
